=============================================================================
Version 5.0 (February 2014)
=============================================================================
- DEX is now called SPARKSEE.
- New PYTHON interface: Sparkseepython.
- Added support for 64 bits processors on iOS.
- New Select APIs to restrict the search on a given set of Objects.
- New RenameType and RenameAttribute APIs added.
- New APIs FindOrCreateEdge and FindOrCreateObject documentation update.
- Fixed a problem using textstreams with HighAvailability.
- Performance improvement on some Select and Neighbors operations.
- General bug fixing.
